Evaristo Cuesta

Software Developer

I am a software developer located in Seville, Spain and I am lucky that one of my hobbies has become my profession. I have been writing code for more than 20 years, having a special interest in code quality and best practices. I have spent my career using .NET technologies although I have some programming knowledge using Angular, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java or Python. I care about being in continous learning or enhancing my skills.
